Name: Pebble Back Crab
Description: The pebbles adorning its back are collected by the fish while young, serving as defense and camouflage. Some accidentally collect gemstones, and thus are overhunted by humans.

DescriptionLocalization.pt: As pedrinhas que adornam seu dorso são coletadas pelos peixes ainda jovens, servindo de defesa e camuflagem. Alguns acidentalmente coletam pedras preciosas e, portanto, são caçados por humanos.
